mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRODUCT_OUT ( product_id, price, amount, cust_id, create_user_id ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{custId}, #{createUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT productOut.id,brand.id brand_id,brand.name brand_name,product.id product_id,product.product_no,product.product_name,tech.id tech_id,tech.name tech_name,thickness.id thickness_id,thickness.name thickness_name,productOut.amount,product.price stock_price,productOut.price, user.id create_user_id,user.username create_username,productOut.create_time, stock.identify_type FROM t_product_out productOut LEFT JOIN t_product product ON productOut.product_id = product.id LEFT JOIN t_brand brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN t_tech tech ON product.tech_id = tech.id LEFT JOIN t_thickness thickness ON product.thickness_id = thickness.id LEFT JOIN t_user USER ON productOut.create_user_id = user.id LEFT JOIN t_stock stock ON stock.product_id = productOut.product_id

SELECT count(*) FROM t_product_out productOut LEFT JOIN t_product product ON productOut.product_id = product.id LEFT JOIN t_brand brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN t_tech tech ON product.tech_id = tech.id LEFT JOIN t_thickness thickness ON product.thickness_id = thickness.id LEFT JOIN t_identify identify ON productOut.identify_id = identify.id LEFT JOIN t_user user ON productOut.create_user_id = user.id
